last_episode_to_air.name: Crashes and Commitments
last_episode_to_air.overview: Danna confronts Brian and Gabby navigates her feelings. Phil opens up to Carmen about his desire to get serious and Naeem takes a bold step towards a future in Panama.

name: Love Without Borders
overview: In this bold social experiment, six American singles who have struck out at love on their home turf risk everything and step blindly onto a plane to an unknown overseas destination to be paired with their "perfect" life partner.

episodes.name: How Far Would You Go for Love?
episodes.overview: American singles leave everything behind and travel across the globe to pursue the love that’s alluded them forever. Upon arrival, they’ll move in with complete strangers who could be their potential soul mates. Before their visas run out, they’ll have to decide if this new life and love is forever or they should return home, brokenhearted.

episodes.name: Thank God For Red Underwear
episodes.overview: A small-town optometrist leaves his job, family and the small gay dating pool of Fargo to find love in a metropolis on the other side of the world. Another hopeful single overcomes a freak-out and comes face-to-face with her dream man in a new country. One of the Americans deals with a triggering living situation with her match's family. A clean freak from Atlanta tries to adapt to life in a strange land with no creature comforts.

episodes.name: You Don’t Have to Do That
episodes.overview: Naeem is ready for love, but his mom disagrees. Gurleen and Shreyas seek privacy, but a misunderstanding strains their connection. Brian and Danna deepen their bond. Mael and Aaron struggle in their relationship. Philip battles to stay celibate.

episodes.name: We're Looking at Rings
episodes.overview: Naeem lands in Panama and is instantly besotted. Danna and Brian grow closer and contemplate her future farm life in Galway. Carmen finds provocative content on Philip's social media. Mael introduces country bumpkin Aaron to French fare as they bond.

episodes.name: Things Are Getting Touchy
episodes.overview: Things take a turn as Naeem’s childish antics wear on Chandra. During a double date, Gurleen and Shreyas’ sleeping situation is challenged. Danna questions Brian’s feelings for her. Aaron consults Arica on how to accelerate intimacy with Mael.

episodes.name: WTF Times Two
episodes.overview: Chandra takes Naeem clubbing, but things take an unexpected turn; Mael worries Aaron isn't taking the process seriously enough; Brian tries to remain open to Danna and works to regain her trust; Gurleen and Shreyas struggle to find common ground.

episodes.name: I Hope He Has a Really Big ... Heart
episodes.overview: Carmen shows Phil her party lifestyle, but he struggles to keep up; Arica tries to mediate between Shreyas and Gurleen; Naeem helps Chandra process past trauma; Aaron tries to make things up to Mael; Danna and Brian find creative ways to reconnect.

episodes.name: New Years And Old Fears
episodes.overview: As the pairs ring in the new year, Mael and Aaron must navigate an awkward tradition; Shreyas prepares for a surprise guest; Phil accuses Carmen of being unreachable; Chandra catches Naeem in a lie; Danna asks Brian if he sees a future with her.

episodes.name: Don’t Go Chasing Waterfalls
episodes.overview: Shreyas introduces his new match to his family; Phil tries to sweep Carmen off her feet at a waterfall; Danna is disappointed by Brian's insensitivity; Chandra meets with Arica to express her concerns; Mael struggles to trust Aaron's intentions.

episodes.name: Crashes and Commitments
episodes.overview: Danna confronts Brian and Gabby navigates her feelings. Phil opens up to Carmen about his desire to get serious and Naeem takes a bold step towards a future in Panama.
